Brittle.card_desc: [Shatter] Reduce the Cooldown of Shatter by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Carry On.card_desc: [Illusion] Increase the duration of your Illusions by {scale=1|1}s.

Disappear.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=7|7}% while Out of Combat.

Efficiency.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Reduce the Cooldown of Dimensional Link by {scale=1|1}s.

Encouragement.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=1|1}s after getting an Elimination.

Focusing Lens.card_desc: [Weapon] Deal an additional 200 damage to an enemy if you hit them with all 5 shots of Illusory Mirror.

Fracture.card_desc: [Shatter] Heal your Illusions for {scale=20|20}% of their maximum Health after activating Shatter.

Harmony.card_desc: [Shatter] Heal for {scale=13|13}% of the damage dealt by Shatter.

Life Exchange.card_desc: [Shatter] Shatter instantly Heals your target for 700, but its Cooldown is increased by 1s and it no longer explodes your Illusions.

Pursuit.card_desc: [Shatter] Increase the Movement Speed of Illusions by {scale=8|8}% during Shatter.

Resonance.card_desc: [Shatter] If an Illusion is killed or expires, it triggers a Shatter explosion, dealing 500 damage.

Rewind.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Spawn an Illusion with {scale=20|20}% Health when you swap to the spot of a dead Illusion.

Shuffle.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% while Dimensional Link is active.

Spring Bloom.card_desc: [Illusion] Reduce the Cooldown of Illusion by {scale=0.5|0.5}s when an Illusion dies to an enemy.

Spring Forward.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Increase the duration of Dimensional Link by {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Squadron.card_desc: [Illusion] Increase the Health of each of your Illusions by {scale=100|100}.

Durchmischen.card_desc: [Dimensionskopplung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Dimensionskopplung um {scale=10|10}%.

Effizienz.card_desc: [Dimensionskopplung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Dimensionskopplung um {scale=1|1}s.

Ermutigung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=1|1}s.

Fokussierlinse.card_desc: [Waffe] Treffen alle 5 Illusionsspiegel-Schüsse dasselbe Ziel, werden 200 Schaden zusätzlich verursacht.

Fraktur.card_desc: [Schmetterer] Die Aktivierung von Schmetterer heilt deine Illusionen um {scale=20|20}% ihrer maximalen Gesundheit.

Fr\u00fchlingspracht.card_desc: [Illusion] Stirbt eine Illusion durch einen Gegner, wird die Abklingzeit von Illusion um {scale=0.5|0.5}s reduziert.

Geschwader.card_desc: [Illusion] Erhöht die Gesundheit deiner Illusionen um je {scale=100|100} LP.

Handfest.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Harmonie.card_desc: [Schmetterer] Du wirst um {scale=13|13}% des durch Schmetterer verursachten Schadens geheilt.

Hypnose.card_desc: [Illusion] Nach Aktivierung von Illusion wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Lebenstausch.card_desc: [Schmetterer] Schmetterer heilt dein Ziel nun sofort um 700 LP, lässt die Illusionen aber nicht mehr explodieren und die Abklingzeit wird um 1s erhöht.

Resonanz.card_desc: [Schmetterer] Stirbt oder verschwindet eine Illusion, wird eine Schmetterer-Explosion ausgelöst, die 500 Schaden verursacht.

Spr\u00f6de.card_desc: [Schmetterer] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schmetterer um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Sprung nach vorn.card_desc: [Dimensionskopplung] Erhöht die Dauer von Dimensionskopplung um {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Verfolgung.card_desc: [Schmetterer] Erhöht das Bewegungstempo von Illusionen während Schmetterer um {scale=8|8}%.

Verschwinden.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo außerhalb des Kampfes um {scale=7|7}%.

Weiter so.card_desc: [Illusion] Erhöht die Lebensdauer deiner Illusionen um {scale=1|1}s.

Zur\u00fcckspulen.card_desc: [Dimensionskopplung] Tauschst du die Position mit einer toten Illusion, wird eine Illusion mit {scale=20|20}% Gesundheit erzeugt.

Bond en avant.card_desc: [Lien dimension.] Lien dimensionnel dure {scale=0.7|0.7}s de plus.

Disparition.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=7|7}%.

\u00c9change vital.card_desc: [Fracas] Fracas redonne instantanément 700 PV à votre cible actuelle, mais se recharge 1s moins vite et ne fait pas exploser les illusions.

\u00c9closion printani\u00e8re.card_desc: [Illusion] Le temps de recharge d'Illusion diminue de {scale=0.5|0.5}s dès qu'une illusion est tuée par un ennemi.

Efficacit\u00e9.card_desc: [Lien dimension.] Lien dimensionnel se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

\u00c9lan.card_desc: [Fracas] Durant Fracas, la vitesse des illusions augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Encouragement.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=1|1}s.

\u00c9ph\u00e9m\u00e8re.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Escadron.card_desc: [Illusion] Les illusions ont {scale=100|100} PV de plus.

Fracture.card_desc: [Fracas] Vos illusions récupèrent {scale=20|20}% de leurs PV max. quand vous activez Fracas.

Harmonie.card_desc: [Fracas] Fracas vous soigne à hauteur de {scale=13|13}% des dégâts infligés.

Pagaille.card_desc: [Lien dimension.] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant Lien dimensionnel.

R\u00e9sonance.card_desc: [Fracas] Quand une illusion expire ou est détruite, elle libère une explosion de Fracas de 500 dégâts.

Retour.card_desc: [Lien dimension.] Vous générez une illusion avec {scale=20|20}% de PV quand vous changez de place avec une illusion morte.

Tirs concentr\u00e9s.card_desc: [Arme] Atteindre la même cible avec les 5 tirs du Miroir illusoire inflige 200 dégâts de plus.

\u4ee5\u5047\u4e71\u771f.card_desc: [影分身] 增加影分身{scale=100|100}点生命值

\u4f5c\u6218\u52c7\u6c14.card_desc: [护甲] 参与击败将使所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u50ac\u7720.card_desc: [影分身] 使用影分身时回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u5206\u8eab\u4e13\u7cbe.card_desc: [影分身] 你的影分身持续时间增加{scale=1|1}秒

\u548c\u8c10.card_desc: [幻象破碎] 幻象破碎造成的伤害会有{scale=13|13}%转化为对自身的治疗

\u65f6\u5149\u5012\u6d41.card_desc: [相位链接] 与被消灭的影分身互换位置将生成一个新的具有{scale=20|20}%生命值的影分身

\u6613\u788e.card_desc: [幻象破碎] 幻象破碎的冷却时间降低{scale=0.7|0.7}秒

\u6619\u82b1\u4e00\u73b0.card_desc: [武器] 弹药装填速度增加{scale=8|8}%

\u6625\u6696\u82b1\u5f00.card_desc: [相位链接] 增加相位链接的持续时间{scale=0.7|0.7}秒

\u6d88\u5931.card_desc: [护甲] 脱离战斗后移动速度提高{scale=7|7}%

\u79fb\u5f62\u6362\u5f71.card_desc: [相位链接] 在相位链接持续期间移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u7b49\u4ef7\u4ea4\u6362.card_desc: [幻象破碎] 幻象破碎的冷却时间降低1秒。激活幻象破碎会让每个幻象立即治疗友军800点生命值，但会消耗一个幻象

\u7d27\u8ffd\u4e0d\u820d.card_desc: [幻象破碎] 幻象破碎激活时，影分身移动速度加快{scale=8|8}%

\u7e41\u534e\u4e4b\u6625.card_desc: [影分身] 当幻象被敌人消灭时，减少影分身的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u805a\u7126\u955c\u7247.card_desc: [武器] 单次普通攻击的5段伤害全部命中同一目标时额外造成150点伤害

\u805a\u80fd\u7206\u88c2.card_desc: [幻象破碎] 激活幻象破碎时为所有幻象回复{scale=20|20}%最大生命值

\u9ad8\u6548\u94fe\u63a5.card_desc: [相位链接] 冷却时间减少{scale=1|1}秒

\u9b54\u6cd5\u5171\u9e23.card_desc: [幻象破碎] 影分身消失或被击败时会发生爆炸，造成500点伤害

Disappear.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Gain 15% Movement Speed after using Dimensional Link.

Efficiency.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting a target with all hits of your weapon deals an additional 50 damage.

Mind Wrack.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon attacks slow enemies by 10% for 2s.

Reanimate.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Swapping to an Illusion heals it for 20% of its max Health.

Rewind.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Swapping to the spot of a dead illusion spawns an illusion with 25% Health.

Shuffle.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Reduce the Cooldown of Dimensional Link by 12s. Each swap with Dimensional Link also reduces the remaining Cooldown of Shatter by 0.5s.

Spring Bloom.card_desc: [Shatter] Shattered Illusions spawn an HP Drop that heals for 50.

Spring Forward.card_desc: [Dimensional Link] Increase the duration of Dimensional Link by 0.6s.

Squadron.card_desc: [Illusion] Increase the Health of Illusions by 100.

Alternancia.card_desc: [Vínculo dimensional] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% mientras esté activa Vínculo dimensional.

\u00c1nimo.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reducen todas las recargas activas en {scale=1|1}s después de obtener una eliminación.

Armon\u00eda.card_desc: [Añicos] Te curas un {scale=13|13}% del daño infligido por Añicos.

Avance r\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Vínculo dimensional] La duración de Vínculo dimensional aumenta en {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Continuidad.card_desc: [Ilusión] La duración de tus Ilusiones aumenta en {scale=1|1}s.

Desaparici\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=7|7}% mientras estés fuera de combate

Eficiencia.card_desc: [Vínculo dimensional] Se reduce la recarga de Vínculo dimensional en {scale=1|1}s.

Ef\u00edmero.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=8|8}%.

Escuadr\u00f3n.card_desc: [Ilusión] Aumentas la salud de las ilusiones en {scale=100|100} PS.

Floraci\u00f3n primaveral.card_desc: [Ilusión] Cuando un enemigo elimina una Ilusión, su recarga se reduce en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Fractura.card_desc: [Añicos] Tus ilusiones se curan un {scale=20|20}% de su salud máxima tras activar Añicos.

Fr\u00e1gil.card_desc: [Añicos] Se reduce la recarga de Añicos en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Hipnotismo.card_desc: [Ilusión] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras activar Ilusión.

Intercambio de vida.card_desc: [Añicos] Añicos cura a tu objetivo instantáneamente 700 PS, pero la recarga aumenta en 1s y ya no explosiona tus Ilusiones.

Lente de enfoque.card_desc: [Arma] Infliges 200 PS de daño adicionales a un enemigo si lo alcanzas con 5 disparos de Espejo Ilusorio.

Persecuci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Añicos] La velocidad de movimiento de tus Ilusiones aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante Añicos.

Rebobinar.card_desc: [Vínculo dimensional] Creas una ilusión con un {scale=20|20}% de salud al intercambiar lugares con una Ilusión muerta.

Resonancia.card_desc: [Añicos] Si una Ilusión muere o expira, desencadena una explosión que inflige 500 PS de daño.

Tangible.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Continuar.card_desc: [Ilusão] Aumenta em {scale=1|1}s a duração das suas Ilusões.

Desaparecer.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=7|7}% enquanto estiver fora do combate.

Ef\u00eamero.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a velocidade em que carrega a arma.

Efic\u00e1cia.card_desc: [Fuga Dimensional] Reduz o intervalo da Fuga Dimensional em {scale=1|1}s.

Encorajamento.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz os intervalos ativos em {scale=1|1}s após conseguir uma eliminação.

Esquadr\u00e3o.card_desc: [Ilusão] Aumenta a vida de cada uma das ilusões em {scale=100|100}.

Fr\u00e1gil.card_desc: [Fragmentar] Reduz o intervalo de Fragmentar em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Fratura.card_desc: [Fragmentar] Ativar Fragmentar cura as Ilusões em {scale=20|20}% da vida máxima delas.

Harmonia.card_desc: [Fragmentar] Ying é curada em {scale=13|13}% do dano que Fragmentar causar nos inimigos.

Interc\u00e2mbio Vital.card_desc: [Fragmentar] Fragmentar cura instantaneamente o alvo em 700, mas o intervalo aumenta em 1s e ele não explode mais as Ilusões.

Lentes Focais.card_desc: [Arma] Causa dano adicional de 200 a um inimigo se você acertá-lo com todos os 5 disparos do Espelho Ilusório.

Mesmerismo.card_desc: [Ilusão] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição após ativar uma Ilusão.

Misturar.card_desc: [Fuga Dimensional] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% enquanto a Fuga Dimensional estiver ativa.

Perseguidora.card_desc: [Fragmentar] Ilusões movem-se {scale=8|8}% mais rápido ao ativar Fragmentar.

Rebobinar.card_desc: [Fuga Dimensional] Trocar de lugar com uma Ilusão morta cria uma nova Ilusão com {scale=20|20}% de vida.

Reposi\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Ilusão] Reduz o intervalo da Ilusão em {scale=0.5|0.5}s quando as ilusões são eliminadas por um inimigo.

Resson\u00e2ncia.card_desc: [Fragmentar] Se uma Ilusão for morta ou desaparecer, ela provoca uma explosão que causa 500 de dano.

Salto Adiante.card_desc: [Fuga Dimensional] Aumenta a duração da Fuga Dimensional em {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Tang\u00edvel.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

\u0411\u0440\u043e\u0441\u043e\u043a \u0.card_desc: [Пространственная связь] Длительность Пространственной связи увеличивается на {scale=0.7|0.7} с.

\u0412\u0435\u0441\u0435\u043d\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Иллюзия] Смерть иллюзий от руки врага сокращает перезарядку Иллюзии на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0413\u0430\u0440\u043c\u043e\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Осколки] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=13|13}% от урона, нанесенного Осколками.

\u0414\u043e\u043b\u0433\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Иллюзия] Длительность действия Иллюзии увеличивается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0418\u0437\u043b\u043e\u043c.card_desc: [Осколки] Активация Осколков исцеляет иллюзии на {scale=20|20}% от их максимального здоровья.

\u0418\u0441\u0447\u0435\u0437\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Скорость передвижения вне боя повышается на {scale=7|7}%.

\u041e\u0431\u043c\u0435\u043d \u0436\u0.card_desc: [Осколки] Осколки мгновенно исцеляют цель на 700 ед., но не взрывают иллюзии и перезаряжаются на 1 с. медленнее.

\u041e\u0431\u043e\u0434\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041e\u0441\u044f\u0437\u0430\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043c\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Пространственная связь] Перемещение на место мертвой иллюзии призывает иллюзию со здоровьем {scale=20|20}%.

\u041f\u043e\u0433\u043e\u043d\u044f.card_desc: [Осколки] Во время действия Осколков скорость передвижения Иллюзий повышается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0420\u0435\u0437\u043e\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Осколки] При убийстве или исчезновении иллюзии Осколки взрываются, нанося 500 ед. урона.

\u0423\u043b\u043e\u0432\u043a\u0430.card_desc: [Пространственная связь] Когда действует Пространственная связь, ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0424\u043e\u043a\u0443\u0441-\u043b\u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Если вы поражаете врага всеми 5 выстрелами Иллюзорного зеркала, то он получает еще 200 ед. урона.

\u042d\u0444\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Пространственная связь] Перезарядка Пространственной связи сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

Harmonia.card_desc: [Roztrzaskanie] Przywraca zdrowie w wysokości równej {scale=13|13}% obrażeń zadanych przez Roztrzaskanie.

Krucho\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Roztrzaskanie] Skraca czas odnowienia Roztrzaskania o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Naprz\u00f3d.card_desc: [Iluzja] Wydłuża czas trwania Iluzji o {scale=1|1} s.

Otucha.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowień o {scale=1|1} s.

P\u0119kni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Roztrzaskanie] Aktywacja Roztrzaskania przywraca Iluzjom {scale=20|20}% ich maks. zdrowia.

Po\u015bcig.card_desc: [Roztrzaskanie] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu Iluzji o {scale=8|8}% podczas trwania Roztrzaskania.

Przetasowanie.card_desc: [Przejście międzywymiarowe] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na czas trwania Przejścia międzywymiarowego.

Przewini\u0119cie.card_desc: [Przejście międzywymiarowe] Zamiana miejsca ze zniszczoną Iluzją przywołuje nową, posiadającą {scale=20|20}% pkt. odporności.

Rezonans.card_desc: [Roztrzaskanie] Zniszczona lub odesłana Iluzja wywołuje eksplozję Roztrzaskania, które zadaje 500 obrażeń.

Skuteczno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Przejście międzywymiarowe] Skraca czas odnowienia Przejścia międzywymiarowego o {scale=1|1} s.

Soczewki skupiaj\u0105ce.card_desc: [Broń] Zadaje dodatkowe 200 obrażeń wrogowi, jeśli trafisz go wszystkimi 5 strzałami Iluzorycznego lustra.

Szwadron.card_desc: [Iluzja] Odporność każdej twojej Iluzji zostaje zwiększona o {scale=100|100} PZ.

Wiosenny rozkwit.card_desc: [Iluzja] Iluzje zabite przez wroga skracają czas odnowienia iluzji o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Wyskok naprz\u00f3d.card_desc: [Przejście międzywymiarowe] Wydłuża czas trwania Przejścia międzywymiarowego o {scale=0.7|0.7} s.

Zamiana \u017cy\u0107.card_desc: [Roztrzaskanie] Roztrzaskanie natychmiast przywraca celowi 700 PZ, ale jego czas odnowienia zostaje wydłużony o 1 s i nie powoduje już eksplozji Iluzji.

Znikni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=7|7}%, gdy jesteś poza walką.

\u017bywotno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Ahenk.card_desc: [Parçalama] Parçalama ile verilen hasarın %{scale=13|13} kadarı iyileş.

Bahar \u00c7i\u00e7e\u011fi.card_desc: [İllüzyon] İllüzyonlar bir düşman tarafından öldürüldüğünde İllüzyon'un bekleme süresi {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalır.

\u00c7atlak.card_desc: [Parçalama] Parçalama'yı etkinleştirdikten sonra İllüzyonlarını Maksimum Canlarının %{scale=20|20} kadarı iyileştir.

Geri Sar.card_desc: [Boyutsal Bağlantı] Ölü bir İllüzyonun konumuna ışınlandığında %{scale=20|20} Canı olan bir İllüzyon ortaya çıkar.

Hayat Takas\u0131.card_desc: [Parçalama] Parçalama, hedefini anında 700 Can İyileştirir ancak illüzyonlarını patlatmaz ve Bekleme Süresi 1sn artar.

Kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.card_desc: [Boyutsal Bağlantı] Boyutsal Bağlantı etkinken Hareket Hızını %{scale=10|10} artır.

Odak Merce\u011fi.card_desc: [Silah] İllüzyon Aynası'nın tüm 5 atışı ile aynı düşmanı vurursan 200 ek hasar daha verirsin.

Rezonans.card_desc: [Parçalama] Bir İllüzyon öldürülür ya da yok olursa, 500 hasar veren bir Parçalama patlamasını tetikler.

Takip.card_desc: [Parçalama] Parçalama sırasında İllüzyonların Hareket Hızını %{scale=8|8} artır.

Verimlilik.card_desc: [Boyutsal Bağlantı] Boyutsal Bağlantı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

Y\u00fcreklendirme.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra {scale=1|1}sn boyunca aktif Bekleme Sürelerini azalt.
